objects.specification: A wide, flat rectangular floor surface with a smooth matte finish in a neutral light gray tone that provides a sturdy and non-reflective walking area, serving as a subtle backdrop for the vivid dinosaur decor and furniture.

A large vertical wall panel painted in a warm earth tone, featuring a slightly textured matte plaster finish that evokes a natural, prehistoric cave‐like ambiance while providing a neutral background for posters and the blackboard.
A sturdy vertical wall with the same warm earth‐tone paint and textured matte finish as the north wall, designed to complement the prehistoric theme while displaying educational posters.
A side wall panel in muted terracotta earth tone with a lightly textured matte surface, providing a cohesive background for the window and wall‐mounted decor.
A complementary side wall painted in the same warm earth tone with matte plaster texture, creating a unified prehistoric classroom aesthetic for shelving and posters.
A large rectangular window with slim pale sky‐blue frame and clear glass panes, accompanied by softly draped light beige curtains to allow natural light to softly filter into the room.
A glossy educational poster depicting a dinosaur species in full color with clear anatomical labels, framed by a slim black border to stand out against the earth‐toned wall.
A glossy educational poster depicting a dinosaur species in full color with clear anatomical labels, framed by a slim black border to stand out against the earth‐toned wall.

A large teacher's desk crafted from natural wood with a rich grain texture, featuring a rectangular top, modesty panel underneath, and green trim accents to reinforce the prehistoric color palette.
A large rectangular chalkboard with a deep matte black surface framed by thin wooden trim, offering a classic look and easy writing surface for lesson content.
A compact ceiling‐mounted projector in off‐white plastic housing with smooth rounded edges and a subtle green accent ring around the lens to tie in with the classroom theme.
A student desk with a smooth natural wood tabletop and slender green metal legs, designed with a simple rectangular form and gentle rounded edges.
A student chair with a molded green plastic seat and backrest, supported by wooden legs matching the desk tone, featuring a slight ergonomic curve for comfort.

A medium‐sized museum‐quality dinosaur sculpture with realistic anatomical detail and textured off‐white finish, representing a different species for educational display.

A tall wooden bookshelf with a rich grain finish and multiple shelves filled with dinosaur‐themed books and educational materials, creating a curated display along the side wall.
A large dinosaur fossil replica featuring articulated bone segments in off‐white resin, displayed on a minimal metal stand to serve as a dramatic classroom centerpiece.
A tall potted plant with glossy broad green leaves in a simple terracotta planter, adding a touch of natural greenery to the corner of the room.
A circular wall clock with a crisp white face, bold black numerals and hands, and a slim metallic bezel, providing clear timekeeping visibility.
A small recessed ceiling light fixture with a frosted glass diffuser and off‐white metal frame, providing soft and even illumination across the classroom.

A small cylindrical waste bin in matte gray metal finish, with a simple open‐top design for easy disposal of classroom paper and lightweight trash.
